keyword: how many calories in a chicken big mac
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Big Mac?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chicken big mac, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Big Mac?
assumptions: McDonald's Chicken Big Mac: two crispy chicken patties, special sauce, shredded lettuce, American cheese, pickles, onions, on a sesame seed bun; standard serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Chicken Big Mac provides about 567 kcal with 28 g protein and 45 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use grilled chicken patties instead of crispy

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken big mac from McDonald's?
faqs.a: Approximately 567 kcal for one standard Chicken Big Mac.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken big mac?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: Does a chicken big mac have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1040 mg, mostly from the sauce and bun.

faqs.q: How does chicken big mac compare to regular big mac calories?
faqs.a: Similar at ~567 kcal vs. 590 kcal for the beef version; chicken is slightly lower in fat.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower calorie chicken big mac?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for grilled patties and skip cheese to reduce by 100-150 kcal.
